quiz1.name: Notes on a Staff Quiz
quiz1.question: Where is middle C located on the music staff?
quiz1.answer: In the middle, between the trebel clef and bass clef
quiz1.option1: On the fourth line of the trebel clef
quiz1.option2: In the second space of the bass clef
quiz1.option3: The space above the middle line
